entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
